thread.section_title: Foodler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Foodler | foodler.com
thread.title: Nick C

author: Nick C
title: Nick C
text: Taste of Siam is an excellent restaurant near the middle of Stoneham center. Their recipes are authentic and are not loaded with salt and overpowering seasonings. Basil fried rice, garlic chicken, and any of their appetizers are a staple to any order here. Their line of curry dishes are perfect as well! I can say that we have never had a bad dish. Would highly recommend, even to Thai people looking for that authentic taste of Thailand .
